thread.section_title: FoxPaw Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FoxPaw | foxpaw.com
thread.title: Margaret

author: Margaret
title: Margaret
text:
I went into FoxPaw on Saturday afternoon after 4pm and received immediate service with a goal of completing the repair before they closed. I though I needed a repair that cost $90.00. I left and came back in less than an hour and when I returned the technician said she was able to charge my phone with a new cable and did not recommend the repair. The cost was $10.00 for the cable.
The staff was courteous, efficient and honest. I could not rate them higher.
